body_html:
Here's what clang-format gives me:

TF_Operation* Placeholder(TF_Graph* graph, TF_Status* s,
                          const char* name = "feed",
                          const tensorflow::PartialTensorShape& shape =
                              tensorflow::PartialTensorShape());

FYI I highly recommend using clang-format (set to Google style). There's an emacs plugin I use, and maybe there are plugins for other editors too. I can provide more info if necessary.
